subject: Track and Field
Pole Vault
Shot Put
lead_paragraph: Casimir Loxsom won the 600 meters at the USA Indoor Track & Field Championships in 1 minute 15.33 seconds, breaking his own American record and winning his first national title.
snippet: Casimir Loxsom won the 600 meters at the USA Indoor Track & Field Championships in 1 minute 15.33 seconds, breaking his own American record and winning his first national title.
